mapper.select: select exam_info.* from exam_info,kaoci where kaoci.exam_id = #{examId} and kaoci.kaoci_id = exam_info.kaoci_id and exam_info.examinee_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_info (exam_info_id, seat, examinee_id, examroom_id, kaoci_id) values (#{examInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examineeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into exam_info
exam_info_id,
seat,
examinee_id,
examroom_id,
kaoci_id,
#{examInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{seat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{examineeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{examroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update exam_info
seat = #{seat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
examinee_id = #{examineeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examroom_id = #{examroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
kaoci_id = #{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where exam_info_id = #{examInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
